text: "Side to Side" is a song recorded by American singer Ariana Grande. It was released on August 30, 2016. It is the third single from her studio album, Dangerous Woman (2016). It is a pop, reggae and R&B; song, featuring guest vocals from rapper Nicki Minaj. ==Charts== === Weekly charts === Chart (2016-2017) Peak position Argentina Anglo (Monitor Latino) 16 Bulgaria (PROPHON) 9 Denmark (Tracklisten) 13 Europe (Euro Digital Songs) 9 France (SNEP) 66 Greece Digital Songs (Billboard) 1 Italy (FIMI) 28 Lebanon (Lebanese Top 20) 9 Norway (VG- lista) 8 Paraguay (Monitor Latino) 18 Philippines (Philippine Hot 100) 55 Russia Airplay (Tophit) 95 South Korea International (Gaon Digital Chart) 22 Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) 13 Venezuela (Record Report) 1 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2016) Position Australia (ARIA) 37 Canada (Canadian Hot 100) 55 Germany (Official German Charts) 96 Hungary (Single Top 40) 66 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) 52 Netherlands (Single Top 100) 75 New Zealand (Recorded Music NZ) 45 Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) 95 UK Singles (Official Charts Company) 49 US Billboard Hot 100 77 Chart (2017) Position Argentina (Monitor Latino) 90 Canada (Canadian Hot 100) 46 Hungary (Dance Top 40) 27 US Billboard Hot 100 43 US Dance/Mix Show Airplay (Billboard) 28 US Mainstream Top 40 (Billboard) 16 US Rhythmic (Billboard) 29 Chart (2018) Position Hungary (Dance Top 40) 94 South Korea International (Gaon) 35 Chart (2019) Position Portugal (AFP) 843 == References == Category:2016 songs Category:Ariana Grande songs Category:Nicki Minaj songs Category:Songs about sexuality Category:Pop songs Category:Reggae songs Category:R&B; songs
